mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.systemName AS "systemName", a.logo AS "logo", a.carousel AS "carousel", a.frequency AS "frequency", a.theme AS "theme", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO mht_portal.cms_display_setting( id, systemName, logo, carousel, frequency, theme, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{systemName}, #{logo}, #{carousel}, #{frequency}, #{theme}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE mht_portal.cms_display_setting SET systemName = #{systemName}, logo = #{logo}, carousel = #{carousel}, frequency = #{frequency}, theme = #{theme}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks}, del_flag = #{delFlag} WHERE id = #{id}
